Name: MameMuimuiScorer
Notes: A controller for The Chimp's Skating Challenge which sets up the mini-game and Gummits. The offsets and sequences of the Gummits are specified in the ActorInfo files PositionList.bcsv and Sequence.bcsv, respectively. The player has 40 seconds to score points. The default high scores are 500 for MameMuimuiScorer and 600 for MameMuimuiScorerLv2. The object needs to be linked to a MameMuimuiAttackMan instance.

SW_A.Description: Kept activated while the mini-game is active.

LinkNamePos.Description: Additional placements that need to be linked to the object.

Values.Notes: Player's position when the mini-game begins

Player2Targetable.Description: The Gummits can be targeted, frozen and defeated by player 2.

YoshiTargetable.Description: Can be targeted and eaten by Yoshi.
